item.title: Can someone RELIABLE send me scae 2.03 with the latest update of SRL?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

The only thing I can suggest, is unistall SCAR and everything in it (Including any SRL stuff you have), and you can save any scripts you want to just by temporarily moving them to a different folder. Then unistall WinRar, and then re-download SCAR. Re-Download Win-rar, and re-download SRL. That’s the only option I can think of. Sorry.

C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\4X0FOVCR\SRLv340[1].rar: Unexpected end of archive

the download only has 2 folders, one that is called … and another called includes

when i extract, i get

C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\4X0FOVCR\SRLv340[1].rar: Unexpected end of archive

C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\4X0FOVCR\SRLv340[1].rar: CRC failed in includes\SRL\SCSS\SCSS.exe. The file is corrupt

C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\4X0FOVCR\SRLv340[1].rar: Unexpected end of archive

ty for all youyr time btw, i really appreciate your kindness

item.title: Can someone RELIABLE send me scae 2.03 with the latest update of SRL?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, I took some screen shots of how I set it up.

First, go to the SRL Download link I gave above, then you should see something like this on the right hand side:

Click on the circled link.

Then something like this should pop up ( If you’re using firefox ) :

Choose the circled option, and press OK.

Then it should open up in a WinRar window like this:

Press Extract.

Then this should pop up:

Navigate to your Scar 2.03 folder, and click it. For me, the destination was
C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03

Press OK, and then it should start extracting. If this pops up:

Then press the circled option, ‘Replace All’. Then it should finish the extraction.

Open up a new SCAR Window, and go to File > Open. Go to the Scar 2.03 > Includes > SRL. Here you should see this:

Open the circled file, ‘SetupSRL’. Run the script, and this should come up:

Set it to your likings, and click ‘Save Settings’. Then you’re done!

Hopefully that will help :).

-Weibs.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone RELIABLE send me scae 2.03 with the latest update of SRL?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Oh, ok. I think I see your problem.

Do you have WinRar? If not, download it here: http://www.win-rar.com/index.php?id=160&dl=wrar361.exe

Just save to disk, and then don’t worry about filling out any of the forms on that page. Once you’ve installed WinRar, open up the SRLv340.rar and a WinRar window should pop up.

Press the ‘Extract’ button, then choose the destination path, which you should set as your Scar 2.03 folder. Then press ‘Ok’ and watch it extract.

If anything pops up saying ‘There is already a file named this’ or something, just hit ‘Replace All’. After its done, look for the SetupSRL.scar file again.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone RELIABLE send me scae 2.03 with the latest update of SRL?
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Scar 2.03:

www.dylock.net/scar

SRL 3.4:

http://villu-reborn.com/showthread.php?t=3410

Install SCAR, and then download SRL and extract the files, using WinRar, to the root folder of SCAR. Example: If you installed SCAR to C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03 Then extract to that folder, and make sure the path of extraction says exactly that. Then press Replace all, if it comes up, and then it should be properly installed. To setup SRL, you should go to
Scar 2.03\Includes\SRL and run SetupSRL. If it successfully executes, then SRL is properly installed.

As for scarscape, I’m not sure, the link I found doesn’t work. I’ll look for it though. If you have any other questions, just ask.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
